vqcpc-bach

View the Project on GitHub SonyCSLParis/vqcpc-bach

Vector Quantized Contrastive Predictive Coding for Template-based Music

This repository describes the additional material and experiments around the paper “Vector Quantized Contrastive Predictive Coding for Template-based Music Generation” submitted at the 2020 IJCAI-PRICAI Conference.

ABSTRACT

Here, we directly embed the exposed elements

  • Variations of a source piece
  • Examples in the paper
  • Code
